game.name: Selective Memory
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support
game.shortDescription: A third-person psychological exploration game where you relive fragmented memories in three distorted variations: idyllic, mundane, or horrific -- before escaping the loop to make a choice that affects more than just the past.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A third-person psychological exploration game where you relive fragmented memories in three distorted variations: idyllic, mundane, or horrific -- before escaping the loop to make a choice that affects more than just the past.
